summary: Jack Bradon is tasked to reach the South Pole with a dirigible.
cast: Jack Holt|Ralph Graves|Fay Wray|Hobart Bosworth|Roscoe Karns|Harold Goodwin|Clarence Muse|Emmett Corrigan|Richard Alexander|Bess Flowers|George 'Gabby' Hayes|Edward Hearn|Selmer Jackson|Eddie Kane|Kenneth MacDonald|Adrian Morris|William H. O'Brien|Broderick O'Farrell|Alan Roscoe|Harry Strang
director: Director: Frank Capra (as Frank R. Capra)
title: Dirigible
